item.title: The Possibility of Relationships with Others
item.description: I thought it would be fun to include a markdown version of my master’s thesis here for anyone to read if they so desired. I don’t imagine the conversion from .docx to markdown left the document unscathed, but with time the errors will be ironed out. Abstract Levinas offers a rich philosophical insight into the kind of responsibility and ethics that we must have for the Other. This involves a certain conception of what it means to be hospitable which turns out to be impossible.
